definition: secret book or collection of books

sentences.english: We've compiled a list of eight of the best tips from around the world.
sentences.chinese: 我们从世界各地收集整理了八大最佳美容秘笈。

sentences.english: (value vt. ) One of the secrets to gain happiness is to value all you have.
sentences.chinese: 获得幸福的秘笈之一就是珍惜你拥有的一切。

sentences.english: You've been given the Three Secrets to Happiness.
sentences.chinese: 你已经得到了幸福三秘笈。

definition: canonical text/treasury (i.e. book of treasured wisdom)
to hand down secret knowledge from generation to generation within a school or family etc
gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
Buddha's teaching/Buddhist monk's apparel, staff etc/(Daoism) magic weapon/talisman/fig. specially effective device/magic wand
to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)
imperial edict/heavenly book (superstition)/obscure or illegible writing/double dutch
